title: letter 'c' typed on doubleclick
author: jorisherry
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
When using RDP and i doubleclick, I expect only a doubleclick will happen on the remote server

## Current Behavior
The letter 'c' is typed, 

## Possible Solution1
?

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1.  Key combinations are enabled in the config of remote connection, when disabled, the behaviour is normal. The behaviour does not appear with windows built-in RDP tool or on host.

## Context

## Your Environment
* Version used:
Host:
Windows 10 enterprise bu...

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
Hi

Would you mind specifying what Version of mRemoteNG you are using? 
Further what RDP Version have you configured on you connection? 

Thanks

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
